description:
net: use read deadline in Accept on windows

Fixes issue 4296.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

+brainman,

please also consider the effect on, http://codereview.appspot.com/6604072/

LGTM

Thank you very much.

I will submit it in a couple of days, unless others object.

Alex

On 2012/10/28 12:21:18, snaury wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:dave@cheney.net (cc:
> mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

SGTM, but I am perplexed that there is already support for accept deadlines on lines, but no existing tests.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=650edb0b6fd4 ***
